directions: Mix all olives, 3/4 cup oil, 3 tablespoons lemon juice, garlic, parsley, lemon peel, 1/2 teaspoon oregano and red pepper in resealable plastic bag. Chill overnight. Place feta on platter. Drizzle with 1/4 cup oil and 3 tablespoons lemon juice. Sprinkle with 1/2 teaspoon oregano and black pepper. Chill at least 2 hours or overnight.
Place olives and marinade in bowl. Serve olives and feta with pita bread.
ingredients: 1 cup Kalamata olives or other brine-cured black olives
10 ounces feta cheese, cut into 1/2-inch-thick slices
title: Marinated Olives and Feta Cheese
